snippet: The trustees of Union Theological Seminary, a liberal Protestant organization in New York City, voted on Tuesday to divest the school’s $108.4 million endowment from fossil fuel companies.
abstract: Trustees of Union Theological Seminary, a historic cradle of liberal Protestantism in New York City, vote unanimously to divest school’s $108.4 million endowment from fossil fuel companies, tactic aimed at combating climate change.
lead_paragraph: The trustees of Union Theological Seminary, a liberal Protestant organization in New York City, voted on Tuesday to divest the school’s $108.4 million endowment from fossil fuel companies.

headline.main: Campaigning for Environment, Seminary to Divest Some Holdings
headline.print_headline: Campaigning for Environment, Seminary to Divest Some Holdings
